articles.title: Man, ‘significant’ number of birds and snakes killed in Methuen house fire, department says
articles.description:
First responders found an entry that was blocked by clutter, fire officials said.

The post Man, ‘significant’ number of birds and snakes killed in Methuen house fire, department says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A house fire in Methuen resulted in the death of a man and numerous animals.
Firefighters encountered blocked entryways due to clutter during their response efforts.
Local residents may face increased fire safety concerns and awareness in the community.

articles.title: What readers say Boston Mayor Michelle Wu should prioritize in her next term
articles.description:
Housing affordability and public safety emerged as top reader concerns.

The post What readers say Boston Mayor Michelle Wu should prioritize in her next term appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Housing affordability ranked as the top concern for Boston residents in Mayor Wu's next term.
Public safety also emerged as a critical priority among community feedback.
Residents are urging immediate action to address these pressing issues in Boston.
